{{c/core|ranges::basic_istream_view&lt;Val, CharT, Traits&gt;::}}{{tti|iterator}} is the type of the iterators returned by {{rlpt|/#begin|begin()}} of {{c/core|ranges::basic_istream_view&lt;Val, CharT, Traits&gt;}}.

{{tti|iterator}} is an {{lconcept|input_iterator}}, but does not satisfy {{named req|InputIterator}}, and thus does not work with pre-C++20 {{lt|cpp/algorithm}}s.
